website_summaries.verdict: Easily one of the best values on the market. TaoTronic’s earbuds are made for working out, but the noise cancellation is so good that you’ll want to wear them all the time.
pros: They’re incredibly affordable, and they include noise cancellation
The battery lasts up to 9 hours
They’ve got a built-in in-line microphone, so making phone calls is a snap
cons: The noise cancellation is passive, so it’s not as good as headphones with active noise cancellation
The wire between each earbud is a bit short, making it a bad fit for people with larger necks
It doesn’t have EQ settings like other TaoTronics headphones do

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I needed some decent headphones that wouldn’t break the bank. My second pair of Beats broke on me again. I got these as a quick fix and based on good reviews and pricing. Man I’ve been blown away. They stay in ear better than any I’ve ever owned and the battery life is insane. Sound quality/ bass isn’t exactly production studio quality but it’s still amazing. Didn’t expect the noise cancellation either. These are quite frankly the best headphones I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.author: dmathewson

customer_reviews.title: Suprising Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much but I was very surprised of the overall product. The sound had very good base and clear high end. The product feels very good to the hands. This is an awesome option for wireless workout headphones!
customer_reviews.author: Beckett K.

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, sounds great, Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: These small headphones have a really big sound. I have several models of the Taotronics Headphones and am rarely disappointed. Over the years there's been only 2 times that memory serves where the battery stopped working and TaoTronics immediately warranted the product. I find that this pair of headphones paired with my Galaxy Note 9 in seconds. The battery lasts for hours. The sound can be loud (i like it loud) has great treble, mids and base when you get a good seal. They also came with multiple size of ear cushions. I can recommend these. I own these. 2 pairs actually. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: terster

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I always have issues with headphones that bend by the port and loses sound , I also lose the ear buds. But with the new taotonic headphones I don't see this happening. Great product, functional and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: AlohaWathsi

customer_reviews.title: Longer playtime than Air Pods
customer_reviews.text: Wireless Bluetooth headphones are a must have for me. I’ve gotten addicted to Audible books as I’m working around the house or in the yard. Maneuvering with wired headphones makes everything more frustrating. I can’t tell you how many times I’ve caught the wired headphones on something and ripped them out of my ears. And to be honest, I’ll reach for these more often than I do my Air Pods because the playtime on these is at least double than that of the Air Pods and the quality is equally as comparable. And these will not break the bank. No issues (that I’ve had) with disconnection, good range and excellent price point make these a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Evette Rowley

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I bought the first pair as a Christmas present to someone and it broke within the first few times of using it. Someone from the company reached out for a replacement and they worked quickly to get my issue resolved. Maybe the first pair was defective but I’m currently using the replacement, and they’re working better than I expected. The ear tips come in various sizes and do not slip out while running or lifting weights. I thought the earpiece would be irritating bc of the little wings but it actually keeps the earbuds in place very nicely. The product also charges very quickly and is simple to use. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Josephine Yun

customer_reviews.title: They just stopped charging
customer_reviews.text: I have been through several pairs of bluetooth headphones in recent months. I thought I had finally found one I was happy with, and then these just stopped charging a couple weeks ago. No matter how long I had them on the charger for, the battery remained dead. Needless to say, I am more than a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fay

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service, replaced with model that work perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: My previous viewpoint of the product can be disregarded. These people are wonderful and actually care about their customers. Not quite sure if there was an engineering mishap, or perhaps my ears aren't within the realm of the typical hominid. How are these to stay in the ear? They slipped and never fit right, reducing in a light bassless tinny sound. I had to return these, material build was subpar ....the paper thin wires to the ear buds will likely flex and crack when placed in a travel bag/ pocket in transit, which is what happened to the last set I had of a similar design. If you have the Holland tunnel as your ear canals, perhaps these will suffice.
customer_reviews.author: Bring back Funk music

customer_reviews.title: Product died on me
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand but I'm very disappointed that my Earphones stopped working just a couple days after buying it. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Daveon

customer_reviews.title: These don't last more than 60 days
customer_reviews.text: All of these wireless bluetooth headphones must be made by the same company, because none of them last more than 60 days. Without warning, they either stop charging or they lose bluetooth connection, permanently. Once you reach the 30 day mark, you'll live in constant wonder, thinking if today is the last day they'll work without a problem, because guaranteed, one day you'll wake up and they just won't work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: It's been unpaired by itself continuously
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product about a month ago because I used taotronic bluetooth headphone(same model but lower battery), and i was pretty satisfied back in the time. However, this one, even though I purchased it since it saying it's up-graded version, sometimes it is unpaired by itself with my laptop and can't even control the sound. Can you guys replace this item, to the new one, there's no damage on item though. I will look forward the answer.
customer_reviews.author: sanghyuckgo

customer_reviews.title: They are good - if they last.
customer_reviews.text: This would be the second pair. The first pair would not charge so I returned them, this second pair was delivered 21 Dec, and they died 12 Feb. Currently online with product support to get a third replacement. ETA - May 10, 2019 - The third replacement died, in 6 months I have went through 3 pairs of these head phones. I sent an email to Sunvalley Brands with no response, so I sent an email directly to the manufacturer Taotronics since the headphones have a one year warranty. ETA - May 23 2019 - Fourth replacement died after a week of use. Contacted manufacturer. These headphones are a big pain in the rear. Not worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Bautista

customer_reviews.title: Work great until they melt while charging.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 pairs of these headphones. They work great until they melt while charging. It didn't happen right away. Support replaced the first pair and this morning the second pair melted. I don't leave the headphones connected to the charger for long periods of time and they are charging off a laptop USB port. I'm concerned this will eventually cause a fire and I'm afraid to use the 1 pair I have left. Looking to get a refund since I bought these about a month ago.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Heckendorn

customer_reviews.title: 2 different sets stopped charging after a few months. Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: In terms of sound quality and design, I really like these headphones. But that was very short-lived. Shortly after I bought my first set of these headphones, they stopped charging. Since I was still inside of the return window, I returned that set for a replacement back in January 2019. Now, 4 months later, these headphones also stopped charging and are now useless. I've tried air-cleaning the micro-usb socket as well as trying a multitude of different charging cables. Nothing. Given that both sets of headphones experienced an identical failure to charge after just a few months, I suspect that this may be a chronic design flaw. I strongly recommend that you steer clear of these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: LeComptes

customer_reviews.title: Heavy wire on the right side
customer_reviews.text: The wire is heavier on the right side which is noticable if you use these while running. There is just enough cable to allow me to wrap the cable around my ear once before inserting the ear bud. This alleviates the problem. I use a wire tie as well. In combination these two measures make the cable almost unnoticeable while running. Earbud needs to be readjusted occasionally however, to increase the bass. Although, the buds never are in danger of completely falling out while running
customer_reviews.author: Lester R.

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable for sensitive ears and they give me a headache if I wear them for too long. The control bar is pretty heavy compared to the weight of the earbuds, so the right one always falls out. They’re kind of an awkward shape so these are only good for low-activity listening, not for the gym at all. They collect a lot of moisture from the ears and they get gross really quickly if you don’t wipe them down often. They size and form act as earplugs so the “noise cancellation” from that is pretty good. The battery lasts a long time so overall is pretty good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Total ripoff
customer_reviews.text: Bought these once, stopped working after a week. Had them replaced, then they stopped working after 2 months. Terrible product, waste of money. ***** Update: The manufacturer sent me a new pair after I reviewed these. It's nice to receive a new pair despite the fact that I don't like receiving uninvited email communication. The headphones are working fine so far, I'll update my review if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: sarah del paine

customer_reviews.title: Good for casual users, not for athletes
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this product to those who would just wear them around the house or walking to work/school, but not for people who like to exercise. For context, I like to go running outside, and I sweat a lot because it is quite hot in Atlanta. My first pair of these lasted around 9-12 months before they broke. I spoke with their company and they sent me a replacement pair very quickly. That pair lasted around 3 months before it broke after I went running. All things considered, I would not recommend this product to people who intend to use these during their workouts. Pros: Price sound customer support cons cannot withstand sweat and break easily due to it
customer_reviews.author: Jack DeSalvo

customer_reviews.title: Broke after about 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: The headphones work great except they started to fall apart after a couple of weeks. The glue attaching the magnets to the backs of the headphones is came off one of the headphones. I get they're not super expensive headphones but they started falling apart on me after about 2 weeks. The sound quality is great for the price, the sound cancelation is almost too good, and the batteries last longer than I need every day however I'm not sure how much longer they're gonna last so I dont plan on buying another pair and can't recommend anyone else does either.
customer_reviews.author: Hector S.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after less than 3 months
customer_reviews.text: These headphones was great while it lasted. But after three months they just stopped working. They turn on but can not connect them to my phone. The weirdest part is that they stopped working literally in the middle of my workout. They suddenly disconnected and would not reconnect no matter what I did.. Which kinda left me on my own w/out my tunes... Gotta be honest and say that the sound was pretty good especially for how much I paid for them but given that they just stopped working without anything to trigger it, I simply would not recommend buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the tao tronics TT-BH07 and wasn't really satisfied with the headphones. The Right earbud was significantly louder than the left and the charging port was showing signs of rust after a 2 weeks. Their customer service reached out and sent out a newer version free of charge and they work great. They last a full 8 hour shift at work and they sound just as good as some more expensive blutooth earbuds. thank you Kiki and Huan from Tao Tronics for the help.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R

customer_reviews.title: Music Keeps Cutting Out
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I really like how well these stay in the ears. They stay put, which is nice. The bad part is they cut out on me constantly. My smartphone is in the living room, I take a walk down the hallway to the bedroom, and I lose the sound! I don't live in a gigantic house, so I don't think this should be happening. The phone has to be right next to me for this not to happen. I'm not very happy with these. Also, it seems like there isn't much sound coming out of the left side. My hunt for good earbuds continues!
customer_reviews.author: JannyP

customer_reviews.title: Beware small eared folk
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality on these is really good for the money, really nice base. Pretty sure you wouldn’t be able to hear anything going on around you while they are on. The reason for three stars: I had these in my ear for about 12 minutes, using the smallest size, and it was so painful in just that amount of time that I returned them. Not too big a deal but I’d rather have a partial refund (had to pay for return shipping) then put myself through that kind of pain.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn McDonnell

customer_reviews.title: The Battery  life is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are not worth having even if they were given to you for free. The battery life is atrocious. I have had two sets of these; the first set died within a month and half. Problem was the battery not charging. When I bought the first pair, they worked fine and decided to get a second so I can leave one at work. Well, first died, and the second came and died with 3 days!! Find a different brand, don’t waste your money. The company said they will send me new ones, it’s been a month, I have given up. I did get my money back for the second one.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Nkhata

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones for price, but no superior quality
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are good for listening to music while at work or play. I also like the magnets to hook the headset together to prevent loss. However, these are not good for phone calls! Calls are crackly and hard to hear. I would have to turn the bluetooth off and convert to handset call since the call quality is really bad.
customer_reviews.author: Snwseoul

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is the same manufacturer that I had for my previous Bluetooth Headphones TaoTronics Wireless which I have lost. The difference between them was the ones I had a thicker cord and the ear pieces sat comfortable, secure and perfectly in the ear without the worries of them falling out while you were running. The new ones do not have that as the wire is a bit thinner and flimsy. The bluetooth sound is good but I prefer a thicker cord or at least a hook over the ear to secure it better.
customer_reviews.author: Latina 66

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay in during runs
customer_reviews.text: I've tried different bud sizes, tried re-arranging the orientation of the earbud but the RIGHT earbud (the side that has the extra weight of the volume adjustment/power) will not stay in--I don't mean it won't stay in over time, it falls out every few strides. I checked the product description page prior to ordering and the description clearly indicates it should.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Kaul

customer_reviews.title: Super value and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my older pair of TaoTronics buds and they appear to be of similar or higher quality. The sounds is a little better than the older model, but still is easily beaten by more premium headphones. For under 30 dollars these really cant be beat though. I've recommended these headphones to a few people and will continue to. Its worth mentioning that they absolutely stay in your ear until you want them out. I feel like that factor is often overlooked when earbuds are designed. Buy these headphones people.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie R

customer_reviews.title: First pair lasted 3 months, second pair 10 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought the first pair of these and they lasted me 3 months. I thought this first pair was defective so I bought a second pair. The second lasted me 10 months and now the earbuds will do this obnoxious beeping noise every 5 seconds or so while it reconnects to my devices. Learned my lesson. **UPDATE** they sent me a free pair and asked me to delete my review above. I will update this review further with my third (free) pair.
customer_reviews.author: Ex-Student

customer_reviews.title: Really good value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, good sound for the price. Haven't had them long enough to judge the battery life decently yet or how they hold up to moisture, but so far, super happy. I'm rough on earbuds so I have two sets, one for working out and the other for every thing else, the latter are the ones I've learned not to spend a lot of money on. These so far have met my expectations and are of a better quality, by a ways, than the last 3 sets of throw aways I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Tallone42

customer_reviews.title: Mic failure but good earbuds and great customer support!
customer_reviews.text: For the most part these earbuds are a good value, however, I have yet to get the mic working on my pair. They sound good, fit well, easy to operate but the mic doesn't work so not very helpful when on a call. Update 1: TaoTronics customer service reached out and offered to replace the defective headphones. Great support! Update 2: I received a replacement pair and the replacement works great - including the mic. Customer service was great! Because of that I upped my review from 2 starts to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Corry Macfarlane

customer_reviews.title: unstable connection, no multiple device connection, very poor voice!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: First bluetooth wireless earphones from Taotronics, the sound quality is average. Portable, very light, magnetic stud Probably value-for-money because it's cheap? Idk, no comparison with others...but I heard many China brands do way better Cons: unstable connection, cannot connect multiple device (it remembers too well), not user friendly, the biggest point is: cannot make calls because the voice is soooooo soft, nobody hears you unless u speak directly to the microphone, like taking off the earbud and only hold the microphone right next to your mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Chuch

customer_reviews.title: Hurts My Ears
customer_reviews.text: The work very well, however it hurts my ears. It's uncomfortable when I wear them with ear muffs and it really hurts when I have on ear muffs. The chord is short, so if you want to talk directly into the mic you have to take out one of the ear plugs....so I don't use them much. Even with the adjustable pieces, it still hurts. Wouldn't buy again or recommend buying. After posting this, the company taking pride in their products, sent me an upgraded pair. They work better. They don't hurt my ears! I've been getting a lot of compliments on them as well! So go with the upgraded version instead!
customer_reviews.author: ShonTe

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Unreliable.
customer_reviews.text: These are complete garbage. As soon as they aren't in use they turn off. Want to watch YouTube videos? After 1 video they automatically immediately turn off, and they won't turn back on again for 5 minutes! This even happens at full charge. So frustrating!!! They were great for the first 2 days, then this started happening.
customer_reviews.author: David Newland

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little headphones
customer_reviews.text: I have to say the sound quality is excellent on these. I was surprised for $20 the quality on these. Bought a second set for my husband. When I have them in at work I can’t hear the chatter around me. I have to be carful because I start signing or humming and dont realize I’m not quiet but these headphones make me feel like I’m alone in a room instead of a small cubicle with people all around me. I love them and have recommended to many.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Bought a 2nd Pair!
customer_reviews.text: I use these bluetooth earbuds so much that I purchased a second pair to use while the 1st pair are charging. I tend to run the battery until it's dead but they charge pretty quick - about 1 hour to charge on a super charger. NOTE: you cannot use these while they're charging. I often only use one bud and leave the other one hanging. The power light is blue and flashes non-stop while in use. No big deal for me since it's usually tucked into my shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon S.

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: I own probably 6 Tao products. All of their stuff is good. These earphones do get right at 9 hrs of playtime but they recharge rather quickly maybe an hour. Tao sends plenty of spare parts to properly fit your ears. The cord could be a little longer as I have large melon to work with. Give them a try. I would buy them again for what I paid for them.
customer_reviews.author: Viper

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working After Only One Use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones to use to workout. I used them only once and when I went to put them on a second time, it didn't turn on. So, I thought .. maybe it needs a charge, although it shouldn't have needed one so quickly. So, I put it on a charger and no light came on. I tried several plugs. Nothing worked. I'm very disappointed in the results of this product. The one star is for the ONE AND ONLY TIME they worked. What a waste!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Seb Ceasar

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: They are uncomfortable and heavy. Don’t automatically pair with device that was previously paired. Often had to remove from device and then re pair After two weeks no longer pairs or is even recognized by devices it was previously paired to. Attempted the reset as outlined in instructions. Unit did not respond with double flas of purple light as said it would in the instructions. So now, none of my devices even recognize it
customer_reviews.author: Dale Frye

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value bluetooth headphones for working out
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones to have a reasonably priced pair for working out and they've exceeded my expectations. They've got enough battery power to make it through marathon training runs. They stay in place while running and doing strength training and are comfortable while doing so. They've survived downpours and being accidentally run through the laundry. I've taken a few calls on them while taking a walk and the person on the other side didn't have any issues hearing me. The magnets work great to keep them around my neck when i take them out. Overall they're excellent headphones, my wife also has a pair and I've recommended them to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Allen

customer_reviews.title: I am a forever customer!
customer_reviews.text: Have only had these since Christmas. Great sound, was enjoying them and then suddenly the left ear piece just popped apart and is no unusable. Update: Fantastic customer support with Tao Tronics! They reached out immediately with my issue, set me up with a link to clarify my purchase and activate my warranty, and replaced my earbud headset right away. I have had them now for a few months and they are the best I've ever had. Great sound, great battery charge duration, and holding up well. I am a forever customer!
customer_reviews.author: jg

customer_reviews.title: Best earbuds I've used while mowing
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few other earbuds that purported noise cancellation to use during my every day activities but also while mowing the lawn. I've switched to using the TT-BH07's because they're reasonably priced and the noise cancellation actually works. Instead of needing to wear over the ear headphones to block the noise of the mower I can simply insert these earbuds and work. I was skeptical that they'd stay in my ear w/o a loop to hook on top of my ear but I was surprised as to how well the earbuds fit. Most of all they're extremely comfortable. The battery life is surprisingly great too.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas V.

customer_reviews.title: Great, for the money
customer_reviews.text: I scoured Amazon and review sites for the right Bluetooth headphones and became exhausted. I almost gave up when my dad recommended these. I figured for $20 (lightning deal), why not give them a shot? So far I am pleased with them. They sound decent, the connection is a little static-y at times but good for the most part, they're comfortable and fit my ears well, and they hold charge well. It seems some people are having issues with the USB port rusting out, so I am going to keep an eye out for that.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Barrish

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: had the headphones for about 3 weeks and they already don't work. I turn them on try to listen to music, they work for a few seconds then just starting giving out weird high pitch noises/static. Very disappointed in the quality of these headphones as I own an older set from the same company and those still work properly
customer_reviews.author: Felipe

customer_reviews.title: Reliable quality & Great Bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: This headphone is awesome! I would recommend it to my friends n family. I bought these when my existing pair (different brand) suddenly stopped working. I needed a pair quickly as I use them at work to listen to music, do phone calls etc, thats when I picked these up. It has great sound quality, and are inexpensive. Plus it can work with almost any device. Here are some of them but not all: android phones, mac, ipad, chromebook & fire stick. All in all this was a purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gopi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and battery life
customer_reviews.text: I picked up these headphones because my wireless earbuds battery had gone out the windows. This has been an excellent replacement as the battery life on this is out of this world. I use each day for my workouts and am able to go a week and and a half between charges (might be able to go longer, but I dislike working out without music, so i charge them up to be safe). The sound quality is great and cannot beat for the price. I like how it cancels out the noise of the gym an brings the sounds to life. I also listen to podcasts, and they sound perfect as well. I would pick these up again without hesitation!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery J. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The sound is very thin. Really no bass what so ever. The unit fits well enough and my ears do not fatigue. But the sound isn't that good at all. Compared to earbuds that cost more, you get what you pay for. So don't expect Bose or Sony performance for the price of Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: I got what paid I for.
customer_reviews.text: I seldom write a review but this my experience on this headphone. Pros: Cheap, durable and has a good battery life. Good for cellphone calls. Cons: Little or no bass at all. If you want to listen to some thumping music, this is not for you. Hard to pair with Android phones.
customer_reviews.author: Henreski

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I've owned these for about a week. And so far they have been impressive. They work well, clear voice calls, and decent sound for music and podcasts. I do have some issues when i don't use them for a while but i think it is my phone being disconnected from them for a while when i leave them places but all i have to do is turn off blue tooth and turn it back on. Battery has lasted quite a few hours of talk time, but we'll see how that goes as time goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Good sound. Unreliable functionality and pieces falling off.
customer_reviews.text: Have had a version of these for more than a year and this version is the worst I've gotten. Parts keep falling off (the magnetic caps on the end of the buds) and three battery display on the phone is very inaccurate. It goes from 70% to dead very quickly. Sound is fine but overall unreliable. Might start looking at other brands. UPDATE: this company has invested in good customer service, and i got replacement headphones that were much better. I upgraded the star rating from 2 to 4.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So convenient!
customer_reviews.text: No more big-azz ear muffs at the gym and no more arm band to hold my phone! These fit right in my ears, they stay and the sound is excellent. I put the little cord around the back of my neck and then plug my little buds in my ears at the gym. Super happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: 5 star customer service
customer_reviews.text: Customer service rep reached out to me after I left a review listing all the reasons why I did not like the headphones. Random disconnect even with phone in pocket, earpieces falling out, over all a not so good experience. They sent me a new model which performs much better. Earpieces stay in comfortably, no more random disconnects, sound quality is better than original pair. I was not asked to pay for replacement headphones. The seller definitely deserves 5 stars for excellent customer service and its obvious they care since they reached out on their own. Thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: Frizzo000

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was expecting a bit more from these based on reviews. They have decent sound quality and noise cancellation, but the battery life is subpar. I bought them almost a year ago and one side of the headphones just stopped working. To be fair, I keep them in my shirt pocket at work so I'm a little rough on them, but I'd still expect them to work longer than 11 months. I also don't think I was ever able to get 9 hours of battery life out of them, but I never actually timed it. Pretty bummed they broke but I will not be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle H.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: They have started to cut in and out. Cheap, Junk. Only a couple of weeks old. Will try to return
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Big Sound/little headphones
customer_reviews.text: This is my THIRD pair of these headphones!! One pair in living room,one pair in den/workout room,and a pair in my brief case. Yes I think that they are that good! For the price of the headphones,the sound of an more expensive pair of headphones,is worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Shepp

customer_reviews.title: Great Support
customer_reviews.text: The best part of the headphones is the warranty. They will break in the first year if they are used frequently, but the support will send a new pair of headphones by emailing support@taotronics.com, after verifying they are broken without any hassle. The audio quality and battery life is good for the price point. I have had minimal issues with bluetooth connectivity. The previous failures of headphones were the buttons and individual earbuds failing, but all cheap headphones are likely to experience the same problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Little Battery life and noise cancelling.
customer_reviews.text: Update: TaoTronics expeditiously and gracefully replaced this defective unit under warranty. I had a previous version of TaoTronics earbuds (TT-BH12) and they were far superior to these. Unfortunately, I lost them. They actually had a battery life of about 8 hours. And the ears hooks worked much better at sealing out noise, particularly wind noise, than the "Snug Fit" these have. My experience shows a battery life of about one hour in actual use and a deteriorating charge when not in use. If i can return them, they're going back!
customer_reviews.author: joe g rath

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I love these! The last set I had worked until I broke them at the gym being stupid. Bought another set and they're just as good. Great range too - almost 20 yards. Noise cancellation is good and bad - good because I don't hear a thing, bad because my wife thinks I'm ignoring her.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Louie

customer_reviews.title: Good for music, useless for calls
customer_reviews.text: I got these so I could listen to music while I work and clean, so for the most part I'm pleased. The battery lasts quite a while. It does hurt to wear them if I've had them in my ears for a while though, and they're probably the least comfortable wireless earbuds I've owned. Also when I receive calls, I can't hear anything. Even if there's no mic on them, I should at least be able to hear the person on the other end, so if I get a call I have to turn them off, which is annoying. Otherwise, decent pair if you just want something for music.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Fits Well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to use for my TV so I could hear it better without any disruption. I have bought, in the past, very expensive bluetooth earbuds and by far these are more comfortable for my ears. The battery life is also a huge plus as my other ones only last for 4 hours. The sound quality, for me personally, is not as good as my more expensive ones, but with all things considered, this product is way better. I would definitely recommend this product for those who want comfortable, easy to use, and very good quality earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Spahalski Jr.

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT - GOOD PRICE
customer_reviews.text: After using different brands in different price ranges, I realized that battery life is still an struggle for all these devices, no matter the manufacturer. Using them in average 10 hours/week, all devices work fine for about 2 to 3 months, after that battery dies, stop working. With this said, this Tao Tronics headphones are really good, fully charged the battery lasts up to 8 hours (not happening with the other brands I've used lasting 4 to 5 hours tops), these are very comfortable and anatomic, the sound is fairly good and the distance coverage is reasonable. Last but no least, the customer service is very good, I went through a replacement very fast and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Sport one

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable, can’t stay in the ear.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have much expectations from the sound quality and indeed it’s OK (nothing more nothing less) the battery lasts for several hours and in my type of usage I only need to charge it ever couple of days ((up to couple of hours of daily use) The main cons is the fact that they are simply not comfortable and can’t stick in my ears , tried all different sizes included but it’s simply doesn’t work for me
customer_reviews.author: Alon Ayzenberg

customer_reviews.title: This is my Second Pair - Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: I bought another pair after my first ones stopped playing in the left ear. But after a few months this pair all of a sudden stopped working. Then after charging overnight, I tried them the next day and they would not even turn on. So I went to charge them again and they won't take a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Update: the company contacted me shortly after writing my first review. They offered to send me their upgraded model free of charge. I’ve had it a week and so far I am liking it even more than my first set. The ear buds are so comfortable. I’m very impressed at the company’s customer service. It’s obvious they work to earn their customers satisfaction! When I first got this product it worked well. However, after using it less than 10 times in 2 months, it just stopped working. Unit is fully charged but will not power on. Disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Clare

customer_reviews.title: The headphones fail to charge; poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one I have bought - each time, the headphones failed to charge after a while. This time, the unit failed after only three months. I called TaoTronics customer service, and they ordered a replacement for me - but after one week, I have not received the unit. In fact, earlier this year, their promised replacement of my last failed unit never came, and I ended up buying a new unit. The quality of the headphones is good, and the transmitter is good - which is why I kept buying new headphones. But the too-frequent failure of the headphones and their poor customer service are both really disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: HJ808

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable wearing it
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if it is my problem or not, but this earphone doesn’t fit my ear at all, all three size is not okay. My ears are often sore in less than 10 minutes wearing it and need to put it down. And sometime I feel headache after using it. The battery life is okay I think, I use it for two weeks and only charge it once, although I can’t use it for a long period of time because it is uncomfortable wearing it. The Bluetooth connection is okay, only lose connection twice. The mic fails terribly, can’t use it for phone call, I can hear people clearly but they can’t hear me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were so good for the first month that I had them! The battery life is really around 6 hours, but that is still plenty of time. After about a week i could tell it started to loose battery life, but i didnt think anything of it because they were so new. They seemed normal for 3 weeks and then all of a sudden when i went to turn them on, they wouldnt. They were charged, im not sure the issue. But for $20, I guess thats what you pay for. I will probably look into a higher price headphone soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kuhplunk

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: very happy with this purchase. Sound quality wise, it will not blow you away. But the sound is good enough and the functionality is great. Pros. -Low price -Great fit (especially if your athletic) -Light wight -easy connection Cons. -Sound quality isn't great -Bluetooth range isn't as far as I would like. Over all I think this is a great value. I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Matt Roussel

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad for $20 bucks
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband. He was pleasantly surprised how noise cancelling everything was. He mostly listens to podcast, which he said sound good. However, the music did not sound as clear. He could definitely hear the cheap price tag when listening to much. So far he is pleased with the product, but if you are buying to listen to music and want good clarity; then buy a more expensive pair.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Good Build Quality, Great Sounding Earbuds!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after a friend recommended them and I am glad I did. Nearly 9 mos. of use and no issues. I have a two year old at home who loves pulling at anything he can get his hands on—these earbuds have been yanked out and grabbed from my ears and not skipped a beat. My only gripe is a small one—due to the sound/song/call controls being on one side, the weight of the earbuds to one side is heavier which makes listening with one earbud in less realistic. To date, these are the longest lasting, still functioning earbuds I have bought online, would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Chive Owen

customer_reviews.title: not the best
customer_reviews.text: not a lot of range.sometimes they drop the connection and stop working all together. Its wierd.
customer_reviews.author: KCP

customer_reviews.title: Amazing wireless headphones!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! Great price. Great quality. Amazing sound and connection. Long battery life. Magnetic tips are super helpful They are a little annoying though cause they slip on your neck to one side or another constantly. Not the end of the world but irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted...
customer_reviews.text: 2 stars because they actually sound pretty good and the noice cancellation is decent but outta nowhere they stopped connecting to my phone. Thought it was just my phone but they can’t even be discovered on my friends phone. Only had them for like 4 months! This is my 2nd pair too, 1st one the left earbud plays music a lower volume than the right and is getting worse as times goes but at least it works! Looks to be a different model tho the 1st one was less bulky and fit better on my ear than the new bulky one that I got
customer_reviews.author: serapio c.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this second one for my wife as bday gift from our small kids, since she loves watching netflix on her ipad while she’s cooking! Im sure she’ll love it as much as i enjoy using my own wireless earbuds as i go to work. Good gor the price!
customer_reviews.author: miggsLD

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Really like these headphones. Sounds isn’t awesome but they are great to workout with. They were tricky to get used to how they fit in your ears, I had to go back to the pictures to see how the guy wore them.
customer_reviews.author: Denver Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & Good Sound
customer_reviews.text: I have been impressed with the sound quality and noise cancelling of these earbuds. My only complaint is where the power and volume controls are - it weighs down my right side or gets stuck to my neck when sweating enough that it wants to pull the left side out of my ear. Have been pretty happy with all the TaoTronics earbuds we have purchased in our house
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: The headphones seem to be an excellent purchase for the money. They are rather comfortable once I changed out the ear hooks and tips that best fit my ears. They seem to stay in place just fine, but I have yet to take them on a strenuous activity. The sound quality is strong enough drown out the world around, yet cuts out before it can become to hazardous to the users hearing health. I believe these headphones will prove to be a great buy especially if they can produce some longevity of life after repeated use.
customer_reviews.author: Kurtis Logan

customer_reviews.title: not this version
customer_reviews.text: I had a generation of these earbuds a couple of years ago and they lasted at least 2 years. They ended up dying (which is great lifetime for the price) and bought this generation. They only lasted 4 months and now they won't turn on. The first generation I bought fit my small ears great and stayed put. This generation did not stay in my ears during runs. Not impressed with this generation. Not worth the minimal price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Bluetooth headphones for the price, and Exec. Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The first pair I bought one of the earpieces broke. However after reaching out to TaoTronics customer service they quickly sent me a new pair. I have not had any issues with the 2nd pair and love these headphones. I use them all the time and they sound great. They stay in your ear and don't fall out, and the magnetic ear pieces keep them from swinging around when not in use. No issues pairing the headphones with my Galaxy S9. Great product and excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R

customer_reviews.title: Sound
customer_reviews.text: Update: Shortly after writing this review i was contacted by the company offering to replace my headphones. They sent the replacement which I have had no issues with and have followed up with me through out the process to make sure I was happy. Very good company to buy from! I’ve changed my rating to 5 stars now The magnetic pieces are a great touch I will say but the left ear bud continues to lose sound. I’ve only had these for about 2 months. The volume panel is on the right side but outweighs the left side so it’s alwats lopsided. Would be a much better review if the left earpiece worked
customer_reviews.author: tara m

customer_reviews.title: Overall, quality pair of bluetooth headphones at a good value
customer_reviews.text: These head phones provide good sound quality and effective sound cancelling. They have a 20-25ft range within a home, likely a 35-45 foot range when unobstructed outside. The battery life is reasonable and lasts near the advertised amount, and recharge of a fully discharged battery takes 1-1.5 hours depending on your cable current flow. I have experienced infrequent sound quality loss through the microphone while on the phone (i.e., the individual I'm speaking with reports "garbled" words) when frequently walking through the house. I'm very satisfied with these headphones for the price, would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: SO impressed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these over a month ago and holy cow are they awesome. I bought these to replace my Jaybirds that I accidentally ruined thinking they would be junk. Boy was I wrong. These are much better then my J's! Battery life is great, charging every few days (use these daily) and the sound quality is extraordinary. I would definitely say better then my J's. They crank, sometimes too loud, ha! But sure drowned out noise in the gym. Really impressed and recommend these. I also like that they are magnetic so when they aren't in my ears that stay around me neck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price
customer_reviews.text: The product is really good for the price. The headphones are loud enough to use as a hands free alternative while driving. I'm not sure if these are headphones for you if music is your focus. The coes needs a clip or something behind your neck so that it does not slide when you only have one headphone in. The magnetic buds are really nice for when neither bud is in.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Updated: Not functional upon arrival, but replacement offered
customer_reviews.text: Only 1 side worked. This is my 2nd pair. I know perfectly well how to use these. Customer service offered a free replacement with their new model - VAVA MOOV28 - which I think is a significantly better headphone for almost the same price. Apparently Taotronics and VAVA are the same company. I appreciate their customer support and willingness to treat their customers well.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Pairing issue
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality for the price point is satisfactory. The issue I have is having to constantly execute “forget device” and pair the headphones all over again, daily, with my iPhone XR and iPad Mini. The company sent me a replacement and I had hoped it was just a bad set, but no luck. It may be an Apple software issue or a manufacturer issue, but it is exasperating.
customer_reviews.author: W. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Not much to say but a good buy!
customer_reviews.text: These wireless earbuds are super simple and work like a charm when it comes to being active or even lounging. I sleep with these and they arent comfortable but they get the job done. The sound quality mimics that of more expensive earbuds and work perfectly in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Sacc :)

customer_reviews.title: Used to work. But not anymore.
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. Sound is decent, cheap price, and it is pretty durable when I use it at the gym. BUT it hasn't even been a month yet and there is an issue with the bluetooth connection. I was using it successfully until I could not connect it back to my phone. The headphones turn on fine and the sound is still there, but I cannot seem to find it on the bluetooth menu. I'm not sure if this is a common issue but I would love a replacement. I really enjoyed this product but now I am unable to use it because of this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: I love them, my daughter hates them
customer_reviews.text: I like mine a lot but my daughter got the same ones on my recommendation and they only lasted about three months before the right side went dead and the battery would only last 2-3 hours even when she first got them
customer_reviews.author: jacque

customer_reviews.title: Better than average, good quality and worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big guy and the buds fit like a bathtub stopper in my ears and when I’m off mode around my neck the magnets click together and hold reasonably well (but almost tight around my big neck. The buds’ sound quality is better than average, work well and are simple to operate.
customer_reviews.author: MacGrandPa

customer_reviews.title: Such a great value!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for $20 bucks and they are such a great value. Battery life is surprisingly good. The earhooks make all the difference with them staying in the ears. Bluetooth 5.0. Sound quality is average but acceptable. I keep them magnetically attached like a necklace and it's nice to have headphones conveniently with me without thinking. The only thing I don't like is how bulky they are.
customer_reviews.author: Tatterz91

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these. They sound terrible
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Amazon review. I felt compelled to write a review after buying hundreds of products. These headphones sound downright terrible. Worse than free headphones on a plane. Save your money and buy any of the other comprable ones on Amazon. They're better. They have to be
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Gong

customer_reviews.title: Best sound quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried quite a few wireless earbuds and for the price, these are the best I've used. Sound quality and base were impressive. Most importantly for me was that the buds were not too big and stay put in my ears well. I use them daily at the gym and when I'm running and biking. I get lots of workouts and the battery life on them is impressive. I charge them about once a week. I'd highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: James R Johnson

customer_reviews.title: They were nice while they lasted...
customer_reviews.text: I really loved these for the whole month they worked. Unfortunately, even with gentle care and storage, they just stopped synching with anything bluetooth. It's a shame, because until that happened, these were my favorite bluetooth headphones I've owned. To update, the company did see my review and reached out to offer a full refund. As far as customer service goes, they are fantastic, so I have updated my review to reflect their response.
customer_reviews.author: breathingandmakeup

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Low Price, ZERO Hassle!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought and tried half dozen brands, most at higher price points. No Bluetooth earbuds or headphones pair automatically and as consistently like these! I decided to treat myself to 2019 model Samsung galaxy Bluetooth True Wireless Earbuds which cost 5x more but returned them a week later because I was spoiled by TaoTronics easy, automatic pairing. I bought the TaoTronics 5 months ago but writing now because I THOUGHT I had a warranty issue but turns out it was an app software issue. The company was responsive and quickly agreed to replace my headphones although when I learned the TaoTronics were fine I declined the replacement. I’m a new and loyal customer.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna M

customer_reviews.title: This wireless earbuds just wont last
customer_reviews.text: Had this for 2 months. It did had good sound quality for it’s value and I’ve used several headphones and earphones from multiple brands (ATH, Bose, Jbl etc.). Only complaint I had was the sound is a little muddy, especially with the base. I used these as my daily earphones and brought these almost everywhere I go but recently it started having slight cracking/popping noise that gets worse as I used it more often. It got to the point where it would no longer pair and just have constant cracking/popping noise. Now, it would no longer turn on but it would still charge. I would not recommend this product to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Don't Last Long
customer_reviews.text: Updated Review: They quit again, when I first told them they sent me another pair and they worked for about 3 months but now they finally quit again. Spend a little more and get the good stuff or you'll be searching for another pair again like I am right now. They are crap,
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t rave about these headphones enough! I’ve bought these multiple times. The sound quality is great. I work in an office that sometimes gets a little loud when there’s too many conversations going on at once, so the noise cancellation is perfect. They last a really long time! I bought my first pair almost 3 years ago and they still work! (Even after going through the washer and dryer once lol) Excellent quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Decent but doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: It's been 10 months since I purchased this headphones it was fantastic the battery held about 9 hours of playing time and it sounded good for the price. Then finally it completely dies today, a few days ago the the left side intermittently comes and goes and now the battery will not hold any charge. It was on sale when I bought it so I can't really complain but I would not want to buy it again knowing it will not last.
customer_reviews.author: Ken P

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I was having issues with mine. The customer service is fantastic and went above and beyond to help. Taotronics comes through.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: The sound cuts out frequently
customer_reviews.text: These are low quality. Even with my phone in my pocket the sound cuts out frequently. At least once every couple minutes, sometimes multiple times every minutes, it crackles or goes silent for a split second. I got them to listen to audiobooks while I exercise. The cutting out is very distracting to the narrative. I gave them two stars as opposed to one because they are fairly inexpensive as far as wireless earbuds go, but you get what you pay for. I would (and probably will) spring for a more expensive set.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

product_meta.title: Bluetooth Headphones TaoTronics Wireless 5.0 Magnetic Earbuds Snug Fit for Sports with Built in Mic TT-BH07 (IPX6 Waterproof, aptX Stereo, 9 Hours Playtime)
product_meta.description:
Wearing a Necklace
New TaoTronics TT-BH07 headset lets you enjoy great sounds on-the-go. Comfortable and snug fit make sure the headset stays put when you are out running, jogging or exercising. When you are done with your music, simply attach the headphones together and wear like a necklace. 

Freedom to Enjoy
Cut the cord and break away from wires with Bluetooth 5.0. You can enjoy excellent sound performance from this durable, lightweight and sweat-proof headset. Work out and stay fit with clear, natural sound that drives you forward. 

Great Conversation
Not just for music, the headphone is also great for making phone calls with friends and family. Noise Isolation technology filters out the surrounding noise and makes your sound loud and clear. You get high quality, hands-free phone conversation even on the street or inside shopping mall. 

Bluetooth 5.0
Faster and more efficient than ever before, Bluetooth 5.0 improves over the past version with quicker response and lower frequency. You get longer running time and high-quality sound. With up to 9 hours of playtime and just 1 hour of charging time, you spend less time charging and more time doing. 

What’s in the box
TaoTronics TT-BH07 Bluetooth Headphone
3x Ear Tips
3x Ear Hooks
Charging Cable
User Manual
feature_bullets: Perfect workout headphones that are snug and secure so the headphones stay put while running, biking or at the gym.
Built-in magnets let you attach the two headphones together when not using, and wear like a necklace around your neck, a convenient way to carry around when you don't need them.
The rechargeable long battery life means you get 9 hours of continuous music, or can relax with 80 hours of standby time when powered with a 5V external charger.
Cvc 6.0 noise Cancelling microphone reduces outside noises, enable clearer microphone sound.
TT-BH07 earbuds that work with the latest Bluetooth 4.2 technology; easy and fast pairing with smartphones and tablets; aptX codec provides pure, CD-like high quality sound for compatible devices.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars1,830 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: One pair of TaoTronics bluetooth headpones TT-BH07
